contest-event.event-date:
May 11, 1895 D Bo'ness Contest
Bo'ness Contest [1890-1910] 0 Test Piece Contest Bo'ness Contest bo-ness-contest
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Kinneil House, Bo'ness, Scotland Promoted by the Kinneil Band
Prizes: £20, £15, £10, £5
Quickstep: 1. Cambusbarron, 2. Clydebank, 3. Carriden and Bonnybridge divided
"The warmth and sunshine have been almost abnormal. A case of sunstroke is a melancholy proof of this statement. In the course of the band contest the leader of the Kinneil Band lay down on the grass with his hat off, and died on Monday night from the effects of the heat."
April 14, 2012, 8:01 p.m. March 23, 2013, 8:53 p.m.
1 Bo'ness and Carriden Band John Gladney Jnr La Damnation de Faust [arr. Gladney]
2 Bonnybridge & District Charles Woodcock Heroic
3 Alloa Burgh James Robinson Faust [Berlioz arr. Owen]
4 Galashiels Town Thomas Moore Faust [Berlioz arr. Owen]
Unknown Result Cambusbarron Unknown
Unknown Result Clydebank Burgh Band Unknown
Withdrawn Kirkcaldy Trades Unknown
Withdrawn Portobello Unknown
